mapper.select: select a.*,scrapcount+joayocount+(newscount*2)+(recipecount*3) score from (select c.*,count(r.rec_num) recipecount from chef c left join recipe r on r.email = c.email group by r.email having count(r.rec_num)>2) a order by score desc,recipecount desc,newscount desc,joayocount desc,scrapcount desc,joindate desc limit 0,10
select provider from news where receiver=#{receiver} limit #{start},#{end}
select c.*,count(r.rec_num) recipecount from chef c left join recipe r on r.email = c.email where email=#{provider}
select * from recipe where email=#{provider} order by rec_num desc limit 0,2
